text: Mike Crapo (born May 20, 1951) is the senior United States Senator from Idaho. He is a member of the U.S. Republican Party and has been in Senate since January 3, 1999. He was in the United States House of Representatives from 1993 to 1999. Crapo was born on May 20, 1951 in Idaho Falls, Idaho. He studied at Brigham Young University and at Harvard Law School. He is married to Susan Hasleton. They have five children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Mike Crapo, U.S. Senator for Idaho, Home Page Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:American Latter Day Saints Category:Lawyers from Idaho Category:Harvard University alumni Category:United States representatives from Idaho Category:United States senators from Idaho Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Idaho Legislature
title: Mike Crapo
